name: backside

backside noun [C]
(BODY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
the part of the body that you sit on: After cycling for the whole day, my backside was very sore. Synonym
bottom (BODY PART)

backside noun [C]
(BACK PART)
Indian English the back part of something: On the backside of this building you will find a door. Do not write anything on the backside of your answer book.
